description: This is an HTML file for a database viewer frontend interface, including embedded CSS styles and JavaScript code for dynamic data fetching and rendering.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates the sidebar with clickable database items.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database to show tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders fetched data into an HTML table, handling wide content and nested objects.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual cell contents, with support for null, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content or truncated preview.
